mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, description, participantCnt, recruitCnt, onOffStatus, activeFlag, chattingUrl, startDate, endDate, createDate, userId, dueDate, locationInfo, viewCnt) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{participantCnt}, #{recruitCnt}, #{onOffStatus}, 1, #{chattingUrl}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{createDate}, #{userId}, #{dueDate}, #{locationInfo}, 0)
